# 犬
---
![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
1).
,犬 > いぬ,いぬ,狗 > いぬ,いぬ,イヌ

- dog (Canis (lupus) familiaris)
**( Noun;)**
> see also: 
            
2).
,犬 > いぬ,いぬ,狗 > いぬ,いぬ,イヌ

- squealer
- rat
- snitch
- informer
- informant
- spy
**( Noun; Derogatory Usually written using kana alone)**
> see also:  [[みっこくしゃ]]
            
3).
,犬 > いぬ,いぬ,狗 > いぬ,いぬ,イヌ

- loser
- asshole
**( Noun; Derogatory)**
> see also: 
            
4).
,犬 > いぬ,いぬ,狗 > いぬ,いぬ,イヌ

- counterfeit
- inferior
- useless
- wasteful
**( Noun, used as a prefix;)**
> see also:
